about.title: About Ana Jantovan-Șum
about.paragraph1: I'm Ana Jantovan Șum, founder and CEO of Aneta Interior - a studio born from a passion for harmony, details, and spaces that tell stories.
about.paragraph2: For me, interior design is not just about aesthetics, but a way to bring balance to people's lives. I believe in the power of textures, natural light, and clean lines. I like to create interiors that breathe - spaces in which to find yourself, to calm down, to feel at home.
about.paragraph3: My style gravitates around warm minimalism, with elegant accents, natural materials, and carefully thought-out proportions. I have a weakness for subtle contrasts, neutral whites, natural wood, and marble. I'm inspired by architecture, places, people - but also by tranquility.
about.paragraph4: On Instagram and Facebook, I document the journey of each project: from ideas and mood boards to the final details that give life to a space.
about.paragraph5: Behind every concept there is a lot of work, but above all listening. Because true design begins with the question: What do you really want to feel when you get home?

aboutHero.title: ANETA
aboutHero.description_part1: Our team with many years of experience in interior design has successfully implemented projects for clients in various fields. We pride ourselves on our creativity, ability to find innovative solutions, and attention to detail.
aboutHero.description_part2: Each project is a close collaboration between the client and our team, ensuring that your unique and personalized vision is realized.
aboutHero.bottom_description: Modern style with warm tones and natural accents. A bright, balanced, and comfortable space, ideal for daily relaxation.

interiorShowcase.cluj_description_bold: Modern and Comfortable Interior Design with Urban Chic Elements.
interiorShowcase.cluj_description: This space combines contemporary elegance with urban elements through a warm finish of elegant details. The space combines the natural form, neutral tones, and golden accents to create a sophisticated and welcoming ambiance.
interiorShowcase.harmony_description: The design emphasizes clean lines, optimized functionality, and a relaxing color palette. The minimalist furniture and discreet details create a perfect balance between utility and style.

face.discover_h1: Discover our interior design services, tailored to your needs.

ourServices.title: Our Services
ourServices.description: We offer a comprehensive range of web design and development services, tailored to your business's specific needs. From creative concepts to advanced technical implementations, our team helps you transform your ideas into digital reality.
ourServices.design3d_description: We create interactive and captivating web experiences with modern 3D elements. Using cutting-edge technologies, we develop websites that stand out through innovative design and advanced functionality, providing users with a unique and memorable experience.
ourServices.design_avansat_description: We develop complex and customized web solutions, adapted to your business's specific requirements. From interactive web applications to advanced e-commerce platforms, we implement the latest technologies to give you a competitive advantage in the market.
ourServices.design_all_inclusive_description: The complete solution for your online presence - from concept and design to development, SEO optimization, and maintenance. We include everything: responsive design, search engine optimization, social media integration, and continuous technical support.

steps.title: Project Stages
steps.description: The process of creating a unique design, going through key stages from concept to complete implementation, ensures high quality and attention to detail at every step.
steps.concept_description: We begin with developing a unique concept that will highlight your individual characteristics and make your project stand out among others.
steps.space_design_description: The next step is creating a detailed 2D plan that illustrates the functionality and optimal flow of the space.
steps.modeling_3d_description: At this stage, we bring the concept to life through 3D rendering, so you can see all the details and proportions of your future space.
steps.execution_details_description: We carefully develop all technical specifications to ensure that every element of your project is executed with the highest precision.
steps.materials_selection_description: We select materials and finishes that perfectly match your project's concept and budget, to create a harmonious and elegant space.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We love meeting new people and making your space special
